summary: Completed comprehensive testing of MemoryKeeper app - all 3 new features (Quiz, Stories, My Week) and existing features (Family, Memories, Daily Notes) are fully functional. Backend API tests: 18/18 passed. Frontend UI tests: All tabs and interactions working correctly.
seed_data_creation: Test user has 3 family members (Maria-spouse, Michael-son, Sarah-daughter) and 2 memories (Wedding Day 1980, Michael's Birthday 1982). Daily notes created during testing.
context_for_next_testing_agent: All features tested and working. Test session token is valid. Family members and memories display correctly. Quiz game works with difficulty options. Photo Stories slideshow with voice narration works. My Week day selector and daily notes functionality works.

quiz_tab.details: Who Is This? quiz loads with difficulty options (Easy 2 choices, Medium 3 choices). Game starts correctly showing family member photos with answer options. Score tracking and voice hints work.

stories_tab.details: Photo Stories displays memories as clickable cards with thumbnails and year badges. Clicking a story opens slideshow viewer with play/pause controls, skip buttons, voice narration toggle, and memory description.

my_week_tab.details: Week Memories shows day selector buttons (Today, Yesterday, etc.). Daily notes can be added and saved. Notes persist and display with timestamp.

family_section.details: Family members display correctly - Maria (spouse), Michael (son), Sarah (daughter) with category grouping.

memories_section.details: Memory Timeline shows memories with decade filters. Both test memories (Wedding Day, Birthday) display with photos, dates, locations, and people.

daily_notes_api.details: GET /api/daily-notes returns notes. POST creates/appends notes. GET by date works.
